TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DisableDpiAwarenessAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DisableDpiAwarenessAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DisableDpiAwarenessAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 允许 WPF 应用程序对所有用户界面元素禁用每英寸点数 (dpi) 识别。

span.span: Allows WPF applications to disable dots per inch (dpi) awareness for all user interface elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序可以感知 dpi，这会影响如何计算用户界面布局。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications are dpi aware, which affects how user interface layout is calculated. 但是，应用程序可以通过将添加到应用程序程序集来禁用 dpi 感知 。However, an application can disable dpi awareness by adding the to the application assembly. > [!CAUTION] > **不**建议为应用程序设置此属性，除非你需要将应用程序的所有用户界面元素设置为非 dpi 感知。It is **not** recommended that you set this attribute for your application, unless you need all user interface elements of your application to be non-dpi aware. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 通过 在程序集级别声明来禁用应用程序的 Dpi 感知。The following example shows how to disable Dpi awareness for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application by declaring at the assembly level. [!code-csharp[DisableDpiAwareness#DisableDpiAwarenessAttribute1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DisableDpiAwareness/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#disabledpiawarenessattribute1)] [!code-vb[DisableDpiAwareness#DisableDpiAwarenessAttribute1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DisableDpiAwareness/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#disabledpiawarenessattribute1)]
